Entries.KrobusDialogue.003: I see. Yoba plays a big role in everything...$5#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.#$e#%Lannah is busy talking to Krobus.

Entries.divorced: I thought we'd grow old together...$2#$e#%Lannah turns away from you.
Entries.Tue10: *yawn*...$5#$b#I didn't get much sleep last night. I was exploring the mountains.$0#$e#*yawn*...$5#$b#I feel like I could just rest my head in your lap...$5#$e#%Lannah is dozing off.

Entries.Indoor_Day_3: It's not common for me to find free time.$0#$e#I wonder what I'll spend my day doing...$5#$e#%Lannah is pondering to herself.

Entries.LanceMetKrobus: Hmm? You unveiled Krobus to Lannah?$0#$e#I suppose it was only a matter of time.$0

Entries.Forest_98_91: Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you and Lannah...$0#$e#I wish all my fellow shadow people could know this feeling.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I can't say I'm a fan of comedies, but this film shows promise.$1

AfterMovie.Text: *chuckle* That little sapling left an impression on me.$5

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah! There's healthy options here. I was afraid there would only be sweets.$1

AfterMovie.Text: The world is too big for one tale to tell.$5

BeforeMovie.Text: There's something special about that crane machine...$6#$e#Ah. It's nothing, @.$5
The birds bring a unique ambience...$5
Ah. A horror film. We shall see just how 'scary' it is.$0

AfterMovie.Text: Those youngsters have the heart and courage to become adventurers some day.$0

DuringMovie.Text: I was once stranded in a snow storm...$5

AfterMovie.Text: Stardrops are fascinating fruits.$1#$b#Perhaps one day I'll teach you more about them.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I once visited Zuzu City to represent the First Slash at an important shareholder meeting.$0#$e#I wore my special red and white garb. I remember it as if it were yesterday.$1#$e#*chuckle* Even adventurers need financing, @.$5

AfterMovie.Text: That film wasn't what I perceived it to be...$2

Entries.Lance_Text: Cultivate crop seeds obtained by monsters in the highlands to aid Lannah in her research.
Entries.Lance_Objective_1_Text: Deliver a spring monster crop to Lannah.
Entries.Lance_Objective_2_Text: Deliver a summer monster crop to Lannah.
Entries.Lance_Objective_0_Text: Deliver a fall monster crop to Lannah.
Entries.Lance_Objective_3_Text: Deliver a winter monster crop to Lannah.

Entries.65360185/e 65360184: continue/-50 -50/farmer 51 19 2 MarlonFay 52 30 1 Lance -40 -40 3/positionOffset MarlonFay 0 5 true/skippable/viewport 51 30 clamp true/move farmer 0 9 2/pause 1000/faceDirection MarlonFay 0 true/pause 850/speak MarlonFay "Are you prepared? It'll be a long trip."/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "All right. Watch your footing when climbing onto the boat.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection MarlonFay 1 true/pause 500/move farmer 0 1 1/move farmer 1 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Highlands/warp farmer 130 143/faceDirection farmer 3 true/warp MarlonFay 129 143/faceDirection MarlonFay 1 true/warp Lance 120 111/pause 500/viewport 0 143 clamp true/viewport move 2 0 8000 true/pause 5500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/viewport 95 143 clamp true/viewport move -2 0 8000 true/pause 5500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/viewport 129 144 clamp true/pause 1500/speak MarlonFay "We've arrived. How are you holding up, @?$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak MarlonFay "Lannah's outpost is just up these stairs."/pause 750/faceDirection MarlonFay 0 true/pause 500/viewport move 0 -1 6000 true/move MarlonFay 0 -13 0 true/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0 true/pause 500/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/warp MarlonFay 125 113/warp farmer 128 113/viewport 125 112 true/move MarlonFay 0 -3 3 true/move farmer -3 0 0 true/pause 1500/move farmer 0 -1 3 true/pause 1000/speak Lance "...$5"/pause 500/faceDirection Lance 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection Lance 1 true/pause 500/speak Lance "Hello, friends. Welcome to my outpost. You must be exhausted after the long journey.$0"/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "It was uneventful, but that's a good thing in my book.$0"/pause 500/speak Lance "*chuckle* Of course.$1"/pause 650/speed Lance 1/move Lance 2 0 1 true/viewport move 1 0 2000 true/pause 2500/shake Lance 500/pause 300/speak Lance "Please, come inside. I've prepared refreshments. There is much to discuss.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_HighlandsOutpost/warp Lance 7 5/faceDirection Lance 2 true/warp MarlonFay 7 7/faceDirection MarlonFay 0 true/warp farmer 8 7/faceDirection farmer 0 true/positionOffset Lance 32 -6 true/stopMusic/playSound doorClose/pause 500/playSound doorClose/pause 350/playSound doorClose/pause 250/playMusic SDV_Fireplace/pause 1250/positionOffset farmer 25 15 true/viewport 7 7 true/pause 1000/speak Lance "My outpost may be small, but I assure you it packs the necessary punch for surviving the highlands.$0#$b#The magical flames act as a form of monster repellent. I created them myself.$1"/pause 500/emote Lance 40/pause 300/speak Lance "I'm conducting research out here, on behalf of my master.$0#$b#There's something special about the monsters that inhabit this region...$1#$b#Although uncommon, some possess peculiar seeds ripe with abnormal arcane properties.$0"/pause 500/shake MarlonFay 400/pause 200/speak MarlonFay "Hmm. Seeds you say? As in crop seeds? @ is an expert in that department.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 750/showFrame farmer 97 true/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 500/speak Lance "Ah, yes. I'm quite aware of your endeavors, @!$1#$b#Allow me to share the knowledge I've gained from my research thus far.$0"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/message "Lannah shared her findings with Marlon and I. She asked us to hunt highland monsters to obtain their strange crop seeds and to try cultivating them."/pause 1000/message "Before I knew it, hours had passed by... It's now time to head back home. I wonder what's in store for me at the highlands?"/pause 500/end dialogue MarlonFay "I seldom use my boat for patrolling. I'm glad there's now another use for her.#$e#Hmm. I'm afraid I can't commit to helping Lance's research. I have my own responsibilities in the valley.#$b#I believe a quest of this stature is up your alley though, @."

Entries.6951320/w sunny/f Lance 1000/t 600 1800: continue/-500 -500/farmer 80 80 2 Lance -100 -100 2 Leo 94 69 2/skippable/makeInvisible 81 80 1 10/makeInvisible 78 88 1 4/viewport 80 83 clamp true/viewport move 0 1 5650 true/move farmer 0 7 2 true/pause 8000/showFrame Lance 51 true/warp Lance 83 87/pause 100/showFrame Lance 50 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 49 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 48 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 35 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 34 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 33 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 32 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 31 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 30 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 29 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 52 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 27 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 26 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 25 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 24 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 23 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 22 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 21 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 20 true/pause 1500/speak Lance "Beautiful day, isn't it?$0"/pause 650/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 400/emote farmer 16 true/pause 800/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 750/speak Lance "Ah. Apologies for startling you. That wasn't my intention. I was actually hoping to speak with you.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 40 true/pause 1000/speak Lance "I've been patrolling Ginger Island for a long time, since well before you arrived.$6#$b#I've witnessed you communicating with birds, exchanging walnuts for many labor-intensive deeds.$0#$b#Thanks to you, they've repaired the bridge, and even summoned a beach resort, complete with a full bar.$5#$b#I have to say, I've encountered many adventurers during my time in the guild, but none as mysterious such as yourself.$0"/pause 1000/speed Lance 1/move Lance -1 0 3/pause 500/speak Lance "Are you familiar with magic relics, @?$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 8 true/pause 1000/speak Lance "Hmm. You aren't. That is most interesting, considering everything else you do...$6"/pause 500/emote Lance 40 true/pause 1000/speak Lance "There are many ancient artifacts imbued with magic waiting to be found around the world, many of which come from Galdora.$0#$b#And I just so happen to have a few on me....$5#$b#Here. Hold this.$1"/pause 500/speed Lance 1/move Lance -1 0 3/pause 500/showFrame Lance 15 true/shake Lance 500/pause 100/playSound dwop/pause 500/showFrame Lance 12 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/showFrame farmer 57 true/itemAboveHead joja/pause 3300/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 1650/faceDirection Lance 2 true/pause 500/speak Lance "Use that to follow me up that cliff. Just focus on where you want to go, and grip the relic tightly.$0"/pause 600/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 750/shake Lance 600/pause 150/showFrame Lance 13 true/pause 300/showFrame Lance 16 true/pause 500/speak Lance "These relics come in all sorts of shapes and sizes.$1#$b#For example. This blade I have achieves the same goal that staff does.$5"/pause 750/showFrame Lance 17 true/showFrame Lance 18 true/pause 750/shake Lance 500/pause 500/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/warp Lance 89 94/showFrame Lance 0 true/positionOffset Lance 20 25 true/pause 1600/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1500/showFrame farmer 3 true/pause 500/startJittering/pause 500/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/stopJittering/warp farmer 88 94/viewport 90 95 clamp/faceDirection farmer 2 true/positionOffset farmer 0 15 true/pause 1500/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 750/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 500/speak Lance "Ah. You catch onto new magic quickly, I see. Not too surprising, given your breadth of experience.$1"/pause 1250/faceDirection Lance 2 true/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1000/speak Lance "Ah... now this is a view.$5"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport 109 109 clamp true/viewport move -1 0 7250 true/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport 0 109 clamp true/viewport move 1 0 7250 true/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport 67 95 clamp true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 3500/speak Lance "Have you learned about that ship yet, during your time on the island?$6#$b#They were sailing on a cloudy night, and the ship hit the reef and sank.$6#$b#Some of the sailors were washed away, but a few of them made it to shore and built new lives for themselves here.$6"/pause 1250/globalFade/viewport 90 95 clamp true/pause 2000/speak Lance "...$6#$b#Has Camilla spoken to you about visiting Castle Village yet?$6"/pause 650/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 600/startJittering/pause 600/stopJittering/pause 500/speak Lance "Strange... Magnus hasn't been quiet about your latent magical abilities.$6#$b#I wonder if she's waiting for something. Or it could be some kind of bizarre test...#6#$b#That's just the sort of thing she'd do.$5#$b#Here, let's go back down.$1"/pause 850/showFrame Lance 13 true/pause 100/shake Lance 500/pause 150/showFrame Lance 16 true/pause 500/showFrame Lance 17 true/pause 500/showFrame Lance 18 true/pause 500/shake Lance 400/pause 400/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/showFrame Lance 4 true/warp Lance 80 87/positionOffset Lance -10 -12 true/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1500/showFrame farmer 3 true/pause 500/startJittering/pause 500/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/stopJittering/warp farmer 82 87/viewport 81 88 clamp/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1200/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 650/speak Lance "Well, that Blink Relic was the only test I needed.$0#$b#You handled it as if you'd been working with magical objects for years.$1#$b#I'll take it back now, if you don't mind.$5"/pause 750/speed farmer 1/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 500/showFrame farmer 7 true/pause 100/startJittering/pause 300/playSound dwop/pause 150/stopJittering/pause 100/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/message "The 'Blink Relic' was removed from my inventory."/pause 1000/speak Lance "Whatever Camilla's up to, I'm sure that you and I will both learn about it soon.$0#$b#I'll be seeing more of you, @. Farewell, for now.$1"/pause 750/faceDirection Lance 2 true/pause 650/showFrame Lance 20 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 21 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 22 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 23 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 24 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 25 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 26 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 27 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 52 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 29 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 30 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 31 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 32 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 33 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 34 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 35 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 48 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 49 true/pause 100/showFrame Lance 50 true/pause 100/warp Lance -20 -20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue Leo "Hey. Who's that person with the red hair? I've seen them in places on the island that are hard to climb.$0#$e#The birds say she's a good person!$1"

Entries.65360198/O Lance: continue/-500 -500/farmer 34 101 0 Lance 35 101 0 Krobus -30 -30 2 MarlonFay -50 -50 2/addConversationTopic LanceMetKrobus 10/skippable/showFrame MarlonFay 300/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/pause 350/viewport 35 97 true/move Lance 0 -4 0 true/pause 3000/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 850/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 750/speak Lance "In here?$0"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 750/faceDirection Lance 0 true/pause 400/showFrame farmer 13 true/pause 200/startJittering/pause 200/playSound trashcanlid/pause 450/stopJittering/pause 200/showFrame farmer 12 true/pause 1000/playSound stairsdown/warp farmer -20 -20/pause 1100/warp Lance -20 -20/playSound stairsdown/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic Icicles/changeLocation Sewer/warp Lance 24 21/warp farmer 26 21/warp Krobus 31 16/viewport 31 19 true/move farmer 4 0 0 true/move Lance 8 0 0 true/pause 2000/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/pause 2050/move Lance 0 -2 0 true/pause 1000/emote Lance 16/pause 200/move Krobus 0 1 2/pause 650/shake Krobus 600/pause 600/speak Krobus "*sniff* *sniff* Oh, you must be @'s life partner! You smell awful like them.$0"/pause 400/speak Lance "Your senses are sharp.$0#$b#It's a pleasure and honor to make your acquaintance. My name is Lannah.$1"/pause 500/speak Krobus "I'm Krobus, a merchant of unusual and intriguing goods.$1"/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 750/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 1425/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 500/faceDirection Lance 0 true/pause 250/speak Lance "I must say, I didn't fully believe @ when they spoke of you.$1#$b#I've encountered many shadow people throughout my travels but none as welcoming such as yourself.$0"/pause 300/shake Krobus 500/pause 400/speak Krobus "I'm sorry you've had bad run-ins with my kind...$2#$b#I assure you I'm nothing like them.$0"/pause 500/speak Lance "They've never brought harm to me personally. I'm simply an observer of the unknowns.$0#$b#*chuckle* And yes, you are quite different. I'd even say 'special'.$1"/pause 500/speed Lance 1/move Lance 0 -2 0 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Krobus 1 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 650/emote Lance 40/pause 200/speak Lance "You're small compared to the average shadow person...$6#$b#Are you getting enough to eat down here?$2"/pause 400/jump Krobus/pause 600/speak Krobus "Oh, yes! I get to feast on so many juicy flies!$1#$b#And humans leave treasure troves of tasty food in strange bins outside.$7"/pause 300/shake Lance 500/pause 400/speak Lance "That's no meal for a shadow person of your stature.$0#$b#Let me get something for you.$1"/pause 650/faceDirection Lance 2 true/pause 500/showFrame Lance 53 true/pause 400/shake Lance 400/pause 400/screenFlash 1/warp Lance -30 -30/playSound wand/pause 1500/faceDirection Krobus 2 true/speak Krobus "She seems nice.$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 350/screenFlash 1/playSound wand/warp Lance 32 19/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 400/showFrame Lance 0 true/pause 600/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Lance 0 true/pause 500/speak Lance "I have something for you.$0"/pause 500/move Lance 0 -1 3/pause 500/showFrame Lance 15 true/pause 250/shake Lance 500/pause 150/playSound slime/addObject 31 17 {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Void Root}}/warp MarlonFay 31 17/positionOffset MarlonFay -19 16 true/pause 250/showFrame Lance 12 true/pause 600/faceDirection Lance 2 true/pause 250/move Lance 0 1 2/pause 250/faceDirection Lance 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Lance 0 true/pause 800/showFrame Krobus 17 true/pause 350/emote Krobus 8/pause 500/shake Krobus 600/pause 200/showFrame Krobus 18 true/pause 400/playSound eat/removeSprite 31 17/warp MarlonFay -50 -50/pause 750/showFrame Krobus 17 true/pause 300/showFrame Krobus 0 true/pause 600/speak Krobus "...$3"/pause 650/shake Krobus 500/pause 500/animate Krobus false true 200 20 21 22 23/pause 1000/emote Krobus 20 true/pause 1500/end dialogue Lance "Krobus and I are both very curious about the other's species. I believe we can learn a lot from each other.$0#$b#We've arranged to meet on the 10th and 24th of each season under the cover of darkness at the sewer gate, below Fairhaven Farm.$1#$e#*chuckle* Thank you for introducing me to them.$5#$b#I never could have imagined any of this would be possible.$1#$e#Life can find a strange way to surprise you...$0"
